import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from './auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'client'; constructor(public authService: AuthService) {} // Inject AuthService }
